overview: Ramani Duraiswami is President & CEO of VisiSonics Corporation, and an Associate Professor of Computer Science, at the University of Maryland, College Park (on sabbatical). He has an undergraduate degree from IIT Bombay, and a Ph.D. from Johns Hopkins. VisiSonics creates technologies that enable the recreation and capture of spatially accurate audio-visual scenes for applications in entertainment, gaming, entertainment, scene analysis, surveillance, and audio-visual analytics. The company is based around intellectual property created at the University of Maryland, and licensed exclusively to it.
